meanings.definition: Resembling a bear in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The large, bearlike man lumbered through the forest.
meanings.sent2: The fluffy, bearlike teddy bear was a child's favorite toy.
meanings.sent3: The bearlike dog tried to climb a tree, thinking it was a bear.
meanings.sent4: Her bearlike hug enveloped me in warmth and comfort.
meanings.sent5: The bearlike roar echoed through the mountains, startling the hikers.

meanings.definition: Characteristic of a bear in strength or size.
meanings.sent1: The bearlike strength of the wrestler was unmatched in the competition.
meanings.sent2: The bearlike paws left deep imprints in the snow.
meanings.sent3: The bearlike appetite of the teenager surprised his friends at the dinner table.
meanings.sent4: The bearlike determination of the team led them to victory.
meanings.sent5: The bearlike size of the truck made it difficult to park in tight spaces.
